type.description: type VALIDATOR/OBSERVER for steward service. Currenty only VALIDATOR type is supported. Validators are trusted parties who validate identities and transactions in a distributed fashion. They validate identities by the private key of the identity validator. An outside party can also verify claims using the public key of the validator. Observer nodes may be required as the network scales. From the perspective of Indy clients, an observer node is a read-only copy of the Sovrin ledger performing three functions (Read requests, Hot stanbys, Push subscriptions)
